name: Big Win Las Vegas Casino
summary:
Play Big Win Las Vegas Casino for Free! Play Big win BIG!!

Get Lucky and Strike it BIG in all your favourite casino games in one single app. 
Big Win Las Vegas Casino app gives you chance to WIN BIG in BLACKJACK,ROULETTE,VIDEO POKER,SLOT MACHINES,VIDEO BINGO and many more!

BlackJack: Comes with standard casino rules with option of playing in high stakes tables.

ROULETTE:Comes with 3D visual effect to make is feel live. All you have to do is to start a bet and Spin your luck.Standard casino rules apply.


Video poker: Comes with Jacks or Better,Deuces Wild,Double Bonus and Double Double Bonus Machines.

SLOT MACHINES: An Exciting 3 Reel Machine awaits you in the lobby.

Video Bingo: Comes with option of playing in single card, two card and three card with controllable speeds.

GAME FEATURES:

* Collect hourly BONUS Chips by playing mini Game. You will not leave the house without winning anything!
* Blackjack,Roulette,video poker slot machine and Video Bingo in a Single APP.
* High Stakes games on Offer for the High Rollers.

Our popular Casino game with exciting gameplay and stunning graphics is available now on your favourite Stores.
